attributes.action: give single people special mortgage rates due to only a single income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Single people are penalised in every walk of life. Only 25 percent reduction on Council Tax as an example. We would like the Prime Minister to give single people a tax break and introduce mortgage relief rates or special rates of interest. Why should the single person have to pay relatively more for everything? We have a right to a life too!

rejection.details: There is a similar petitio at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/SinglePeople/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
